mapper.sql: MTA_TBL_ID, MTA_TBL_PNM, MTA_TBL_LNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ORG_CD, INFO_SYS_CD, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TBL_TYP_NM, REL_ENTY_NM, PRSV_TERM, OCCR_CYL, TBL_VOL, EXPT_OCCR_CNT, SUBJ_NM, TAG_INF_NM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TBL_CRE_DT, NOPEN_RSN, OPEN_DATA_LST

MTA_TBL_ID, MTA_TBL_PNM, MTA_TBL_LNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ORG_CD, INFO_SYS_CD, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TBL_TYP_NM, REL_ENTY_NM, PRSV_TERM, OCCR_CYL, TBL_VOL, EXPT_OCCR_CNT, SUBJ_NM, TAG_INF_NM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TBL_CRE_DT, NOPEN_RSN, OPEN_DATA_LST

A.MTA_TBL_ID, MTA_TBL_PNM, MTA_TBL_LNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ORG_CD, INFO_SYS_CD, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TBL_TYP_NM, REL_ENTY_NM, PRSV_TERM, OCCR_CYL, TBL_VOL, EXPT_OCCR_CNT, SUBJ_NM, TAG_INF_NM, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TBL_CRE_DT, NOPEN_RSN, OPEN_DATA_LST
mapper.select: SELECT /* WamMtaTblMapper.selectMtaTblInfoDetail */ A.* , GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_MTA_TBL A WHERE A.MTA_TBL_ID = #{mtaTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT /* WamMtaTblMapper.selectMtaTblList */ A.ORG_CD , D.ORG_NM , A.INFO_SYS_CD , C.INFO_SYS_NM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , A.DB_SCH_ID , A.DB_SCH_PNM , A.MTA_TBL_ID , A.MTA_TBL_PNM , A.MTA_TBL_LNM , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.OBJ_DESCN , IFNULL(A.GAP_STS_CD, 'C') GAP_STS_CD FROM WAM_MTA_TBL A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.INFO_SYS_CD = A.INFO_SYS_CD INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_SYS C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND C.INFO_SYS_CD = B.INFO_SYS_CD INNER JOIN WAA_ORG D ON D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND D.ORG_CD = C.ORG_CD
AND A.ORG_CD = #{orgCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.INFO_SYS_CD IN (SELECT INFO_SYS_CD FROM WAA_INFO_SYS WHERE EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND UPPER(INFO_SYS_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{infoSysNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' )
AND ( B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM LIKE '%' || #{dbConnTrgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbConnTrgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM LIKE '%' || #{dbConnTrgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbConnTrgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND ( A.DB_SCH_PNM LIKE '%' || #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR A.DB_SCH_PNM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(A.MTA_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{tblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%' OR A.MTA_TBL_PNM LIKE '%'||#{tblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR A.MTA_TBL_LNM LIKE '%'||#{tblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MTA_TBL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MTA_TBL_ID = A.MTA_TBL_ID)
AND IFNULL(A.GAP_STS_CD, 'C') = #{gapStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /* WamMtaTblMapper.selectMtaTblListAuto */ A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,B.DB_SCH_ID ,C.DBC_TBL_NM ,D.MTA_TBL_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON B.EXP_DTM = A.EXP_DTM AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL C ON C.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAM_MTA_TBL D ON (D.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID OR D.DB_SCH_ID IS NULL) AND D.MTA_TBL_PNM = C.DBC_TBL_NM INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_SYS E ON E.EXP_DTM = A.EXP_DTM AND E.INFO_SYS_CD = A.INFO_SYS_CD WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT MTA_COL_PNM FROM WAM_MTA_COL X WHERE X.MTA_TBL_ID = D.MTA_TBL_ID DIFFERENCE SELECT DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL Y WHERE Y.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND Y.DBC_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL Y WHERE Y.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND Y.DBC_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM DIFFERENCE SELECT MTA_COL_PNM FROM WAM_MTA_COL X WHERE X.MTA_TBL_ID = D.MTA_TBL_ID )

SELECT /* WamMtaTblMapper.selectWamMtaTblByRqstNo */ A.MTA_TBL_ID , IFNULL(A.MTA_TBL_PNM , '') MTA_TBL_PNM , IFNULL(A.MTA_TBL_LNM , '') MTA_TBL_LNM , IFNULL(A.ORG_CD , '') ORG_CD , IFNULL(A.INFO_SYS_CD , '') INFO_SYS_CD , IFNULL(A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , '') DB_CONN_TRG_ID , IFNULL(A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , '') DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , IFNULL(A.DB_SCH_ID , '') DB_SCH_ID , IFNULL(A.DB_SCH_PNM , '') DB_SCH_PNM , IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '') OBJ_DESCN , IFNULL(A.OBJ_VERS , '') OBJ_VERS , IFNULL(A.REG_TYP_CD , '') REG_TYP_CD , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(A.FRS_RQST_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'') FRS_RQST_DTM , IFNULL(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, '') FRS_RQST_USER_ID , IFNULL(A.RQST_NO , '') RQST_NO , IFNULL(A.RQST_SNO , '') RQST_SNO , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(A.RQST_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'') RQST_DTM , IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID , '') RQST_USER_ID , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(A.APRV_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'') APRV_DTM , IFNULL(A.APRV_USER_ID , '') APRV_USER_ID , IFNULL(A.TBL_TYP_NM , '') TBL_TYP_NM , IFNULL(A.REL_ENTY_NM , '') REL_ENTY_NM , IFNULL(A.SUBJ_NM , '') SUBJ_NM , IFNULL(A.TAG_INF_NM , '') TAG_INF_NM , IFNULL(A.PRSV_TERM , '') PRSV_TERM , IFNULL(A.TBL_VOL , '') TBL_VOL , IFNULL(A.EXPT_OCCR_CNT , '') EXPT_OCCR_CNT , IFNULL(A.TBL_CRE_DT , '') TBL_CRE_DT , IFNULL(A.NOPEN_RSN , '') NOPEN_RSN , IFNULL(A.OPEN_DATA_LST , '') OPEN_DATA_LST , IFNULL(A.OCCR_CYL , '') OCCR_CYL , IFNULL(A.OCCR_CYL , '') OCCR_CYL , IFNULL(A.DQ_DGNS_YN , 'N') DQ_DGNS_YN , IFNULL(A.TBL_CLLT_DCD , 'A') TBL_CLLT_DCD FROM WAM_MTA_TBL A WHERE 1 = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MTA_TBL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND X.MTA_TBL_PNM = A.MTA_TBL_PNM AND X.RVW_STS_CD = '1' ) ORDER BY A.MTA_TBL_PNM
